In childhood I was creative, loved stories and sometimes made up stories
In childhood I walked very early and started talking very early and also recognized the opposite sex very early, and generally started things earlier than my peers
In adolescence I teased others a lot and joked and laughed
In adolescence I had wide interests and jumped from branch to branch a lot
I believe every person should have information about every topic that exists in the world, even very little
I'm quick-witted and witty and they say my answer is in my sleeve
I enjoy facing new things and love the unexpected and am the first to experience anything fresh
I love travel and experiencing new environments and usually don't plan my trips in advance and generally decide in the moment where to go or when and how and with what people
In my work I'm always looking for a shortcut to reach results faster
I constantly change my work or type of work and freshness is important to me
I have the ability to sell 'anything' to anyone
I have the ability to speak (even without prior writing) and attract audiences and can easily transmit my thoughts to others in an understandable and impactful way
I have many friends from different social classes, different ages with different cultures
In any gathering I'm in, with wit and telling jokes or funny memories, I provide pleasant moments for them
I enjoy any gathering and can easily adapt myself to those conditions and crowd and environment, as if I've been with them for years and know them
Sometimes I feel that despite being surrounded and having many friends, when I need an intimate friend I'm alone
I think it's better to be open in life and not get caught in a long-term and restrictive commitment

I'm disgusted by being limited and controlled by others and if someone wants to do this with me, I feel suffocated, so usually in my relationships I don't give much closed information about myself to others and don't like to be available to others
In sexual relationship I'm variety-seeking
I don't want my spouse to be dependent on me and want them to be able to warm the house alone because I have a lot of business outside the house
I don't believe much in raising children and want them to do whatever they like and not be limited and experience to learn
I don't think much about middle age and old age and don't plan and think I'll think about whatever comes when it comes
I give very good advice to others, though I may not act on it myself
If forced to conflict with people I can't overpower, I save myself from danger with cleverness and wordplay

My happiness and satisfaction comes when I do different and creative work with a new perspective or constantly travel to different cities and countries, try new foods and meet people and beliefs and new cultures
